summary: Cryptocurrency mining website with TRC20 (Binance) withdrawal system, user authentication, mining automation with 2 USDT daily earnings, and admin approval/rejection controls
architectural_notes: Mining simulation with configurable daily earnings (2 USDT/day)
Telegram API integration for bonus rewards
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional cryptocurrency mining themed hero background with blockchain network visualization and modern tech aesthetic (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Cryptocurrency mining icon with circuit board pattern and digital coin design (mining-icon.dim_256x256.png)
- TRC20 Binance logo badge for withdrawal section (trc20-badge.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create user authentication system with account creation and login functionality
Implement TRC20 (Binance) withdrawal system with 20 USDT minimum withdrawal amount
Build mining interface with start button that initiates automatic mining for 1-5 day duration with 2 USDT daily earnings calculated at 2 USDT per 24 hours
Create admin panel with ability to approve or reject withdrawal requests
Integrate Telegram channel link https://t.me/Goldhunterfx345 and implement 1.5 USDT bonus system for users who follow the channel
Design professional landing page with visually appealing background suitable for cryptocurrency mining theme

new_feature_requests.summary: User authentication system with account creation and login

Mining interface with start button and automatic mining (1-5 days duration, 2 USDT daily earnings)
